import React, { useState } from 'react' import Button from '@mui/material/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; function Login() { let initialData ={ name : "", email : "", password : "", number : "" } const [formData, setformData] = useState(initialData) let handleInputChange = ()=>{ } return (
Name

Email address
setformData({...formData, email:e.target.value})} placeholder="Enter email" />
Password
setformData({...formData, password:e.target.value})} placeholder="Password" />
Number
setformData({...formData, number:e.target.value})} placeholder="Mobile Number" />
) } export default Login
